attributes.action: Increase Pension's in line with current inflation
attributes.background: Pensioners are being affected by the current increases in inflation in particular energy bills. Many won't receive the £150 council tax benefit as they no longer pay it, leaving them at a disadvantage to those that can.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Reinstate the pensioners triple lock. They cannot cope with the price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/608028

Increase the basic state pensions by £500 a year as an emergency measure: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/605503
